modName: Lanterns of Skyrim Custom Preset for The Goddess ENB
summary: This is a custom made preset, to be used with the Lanterns of Skyrim - All-in-One mod AND The Goddess ENB.
descriptionHtml:
***Attention***
My pc is old and its not handling ENB very well right now, so I will no longer be providing support for this mod because I had to remove the enb.  If you would like to pick up where I left off with it, please send me a pm and I will grant you access to the mod.  I may pick it back up at a later date, but we\'ll see.

This version is brighter and the light radius is higher, than mannygt\'s original preset for the Goddess ENB.  I also tweaked the color a bit also.  This is my very first mod ever, so be kind please.  Any advise or contructive criticism is always welcome. 

Installation:

Pretty simple ....

1. download the main mod here at:  [color=\"#00bfff\"][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18916]Lanterns of Skyrim - All in One[/url][/color] and extract the .esm file to your Data folder.

2. Download my mod and extract the .esp to your Data folder as well.

3. Make sure to check both the .esm and .esp files in the Skyrim Launcher or using NMM 

That\'s it! Your done!  Now just load the game and enjoy the view!


IF UDATING FROM A PREVIOUS VERSION

1. Save your game -- then exit, unchecked Lanterns Of Skyrim - All In One.esm and the previous version of my preset.

2. Load your save, make sure you are in an interior cell and then save and quit.

3.  download the main mod here at:  [color=\"#00bfff\"][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18916]Lanterns of Skyrim - All in One[/url][/color] and extract ONLY the .esm file to your Data folder.

4. Download my mod and extract the .esp to your Data folder as well.

3. Make sure to check both the .esm and .esp files in the Skyrim Launcher or using NMM 

That\'s it! Your done!  Now just load the game and enjoy the view!

                    ----------------------------------------------------------------------

If you want it to look just like my screenshots you will need to install

1.  [color=\"#00bfff\"][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18916]Lanterns of Skyrim - All in One[/url][/color] (obviously lol)
2.  [color=\"#00bfff\"][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23029]The Goddess ENB version 2.2[/url][/color] ( same lol)
3. [color=\"#00bfff\"][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/85]Enhanced Night Skyrim[/url][/color]- I use the Color Galaxy and High Stars options from that mod
4. [color=\"#00bfff\"][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8655]Static Mesh Improvement Mod [/url][/color](or SMIM for short)
5. [color=\"#00bfff\"][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/141]Vurt\'s Skyrim Flora Overhaul[/url][/color]
5. [color=\"#00bfff\"][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13268]Water and Terrain Enhancement Redux[/url][/color] (or  W.A.T.E.R. for short)


                    ------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Changelog:

v2.0 Updated the esp to the newest versions of The Goddess ENB (currently 2.2) and Lanterns Of Skyrim -All In One (newest is version 1.3) and tweeked the setting slightly
v1b -repackaged and reuploaded the main file using proper file structure
         -sorry bout that new to modding and im still learning - thx for your patience
v1 main file

                  ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Other Mods made by NWelf

[color=\"#00BFFF\"][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24816]Gorgeous Men of Skyrim - Vladamir[/url][/color]
[color=\"#00BFFF\"][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25305]Gorgeous Men of Skyrim - Korvain[/url][/color]
[color=\"#00BFFF\"][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/250050Gorgeous Men of Skyrim - Danicus[/url][/color]
Credits:

All credit goes to [color=\"#00bfff\"][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3150929]mannygt[/url][/color] for his awesome mod - Lanterns of Skyrim
       -All I did was tweak it a bit to suit my own tastes

Thanks go to [color=\"#00bfff\"][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/412061]kaix346[/url][/color] for getting me started with modding
And to mannygt for his great [color=\"#00bfff\"][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/articles/14]tutorial[/url][/color] on how to make a custom preset for his mod.

And Thanks to all those who patiently answered my newb questions about modding lol.
author: NWelf
